pullrequest.title: Update plugins to use either 28 or 30 joints

content.raw:
clarification on the description: the version of Atlas v4 in this pull request only has 28 joints. Atlas v5 has 30 joints.

A `rostopic echo /atlas/joint_states` gives an ordered list of joint names under the names field. Run it for v4 and you get:
```
['back_bkz', 'back_bky', 'back_bkx', 'neck_ry', 'l_leg_hpz', 'l_leg_hpx', 'l_leg_hpy', 'l_leg_kny', 'l_leg_aky', 'l_leg_akx', 'r_leg_hpz', 'r_leg_hpx', 'r_leg_hpy', 'r_leg_kny', 'r_leg_aky', 'r_leg_akx', 'l_arm_shz', 'l_arm_shx', 'l_arm_ely', 'l_arm_elx', 'l_arm_wry', 'l_arm_wrx', 'r_arm_shz', 'r_arm_shx', 'r_arm_ely', 'r_arm_elx', 'r_arm_wry', 'r_arm_wrx']
```

But for v5 you get:
```
['back_bkz', 'back_bky', 'back_bkx', 'neck_ry', 'l_leg_hpz', 'l_leg_hpx', 'l_leg_hpy', 'l_leg_kny', 'l_leg_aky', 'l_leg_akx', 'r_leg_hpz', 'r_leg_hpx', 'r_leg_hpy', 'r_leg_kny', 'r_leg_aky', 'r_leg_akx', 'l_arm_shz', 'l_arm_shx', 'l_arm_ely', 'l_arm_elx', 'l_arm_wry', 'l_arm_wrx', 'l_arm_wry2', 'r_arm_shz', 'r_arm_shx', 'r_arm_ely', 'r_arm_elx', 'r_arm_wry', 'r_arm_wrx', 'r_arm_wry2']
```
content.html:
clarification on the description: the version of Atlas v4 in this pull request only has 28 joints. Atlas v5 has 30 joints.

A rostopic echo /atlas/joint_states gives an ordered list of joint names under the names field. Run it for v4 and you get:

['back_bkz', 'back_bky', 'back_bkx', 'neck_ry', 'l_leg_hpz', 'l_leg_hpx', 'l_leg_hpy', 'l_leg_kny', 'l_leg_aky', 'l_leg_akx', 'r_leg_hpz', 'r_leg_hpx', 'r_leg_hpy', 'r_leg_kny', 'r_leg_aky', 'r_leg_akx', 'l_arm_shz', 'l_arm_shx', 'l_arm_ely', 'l_arm_elx', 'l_arm_wry', 'l_arm_wrx', 'r_arm_shz', 'r_arm_shx', 'r_arm_ely', 'r_arm_elx', 'r_arm_wry', 'r_arm_wrx']

But for v5 you get:

['back_bkz', 'back_bky', 'back_bkx', 'neck_ry', 'l_leg_hpz', 'l_leg_hpx', 'l_leg_hpy', 'l_leg_kny', 'l_leg_aky', 'l_leg_akx', 'r_leg_hpz', 'r_leg_hpx', 'r_leg_hpy', 'r_leg_kny', 'r_leg_aky', 'r_leg_akx', 'l_arm_shz', 'l_arm_shx', 'l_arm_ely', 'l_arm_elx', 'l_arm_wry', 'l_arm_wrx', 'l_arm_wry2', 'r_arm_shz', 'r_arm_shx', 'r_arm_ely', 'r_arm_elx', 'r_arm_wry', 'r_arm_wrx', 'r_arm_wry2']
